data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,019 believers in Smolyan to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Smolyan, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Smolyan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,019 believers in Smolyan to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Smolyan, Bulgaria to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Turk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Turk people know you.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Smolyan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Smolyan, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Smolyan, Bulgaria has a population of 101,900.

We estimate Smolyan has 2,019 people who might know Jesus, 81,921 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,959 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2,019 believers in Smolyan, Bulgaria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
